You need to sign into Terra to establish your account. [Launch Terra](https://anvil.terra.bio/#workspaces), and you should be prompted to sign in with your Google account.

You can always access Terra by going to [`anvil.terra.bio`](https://anvil.terra.bio/), or by clicking the link on the AnVIL home page.
